DIM board(100,25)
P. CHR$(134);"Preparing boards..."
FOR I%=1 TO 100:FOR J%=1 TO 25:READ board(I%,J%):P. ".";:NEXT:NEXT:P.
X=0:REPEAT
X=X+1:READ C:P. CHR$(132);X;CHR$(134);"Bingo call: "; C
FOR B=1 TO 100
SCORE = FNupdateBoard(B,C)
IF SCORE>0 B=101
NEXT:P.
UNTIL SCORE>0
P. CHR$(130);"Score: "; SCORE
END
DEFFNupdateBoard(B,C)
CHANGED=FALSE
FOR N=1 TO 25
IF board(B,N)=C board(B,N)=-1:CHANGED=TRUE
NEXT
IF CHANGED P."*"; ELSE P.".";
S=0
ROWS=FALSE:IF CHANGED ROWS=FNcheckRows(B)
COLS=FALSE:IF CHANGED COLS=FNcheckCols(B)
IF ROWS OR COLS S=FNscore(B,C)
=S

DEFFNcheckRows(B)
ANY=FALSE
FOR row=1 TO 5
F=0
FOR col=1 TO 5
IF board(B,((row-1)*5)+col)=-1 F=F+1
NEXT
IF F=5 ANY=TRUE:row=6
NEXT
=ANY

DEFFNcheckCols(B)
ANY=FALSE
FOR col=1 TO 5
F=0
FOR row=1 TO 5
IF board(B,((row-1)*5)+col)=-1 F=F+1
NEXT
IF F=5 ANY=TRUE:col=6
NEXT
=ANY

DEFFNscore(B,C)
P. CHR$(133);"Scoring board ";B
SUM=0
FOR P=1 TO 25
IF board(B,P)>0 SUM=SUM+board(B,P)
NEXT
=SUM*C

REM 100 5x5 grids
DATA 91,5,64,81,34
DATA 15,99,31,63,65
DATA 45,39,54,93,83
DATA 51,14,23,86,32
DATA 19,22,16,13,3
DATA 20,83,38,85,70
DATA 69,12,14,26,84
DATA 19,76,45,78,99
DATA 22,80,90,33,46
DATA 75,31,21,6,28
DATA 22,52,65,75,2
DATA 91,12,45,18,94
DATA 38,66,85,39,1
DATA 24,36,55,74,3
